overview: Hello Dubaikkaran is a Malayalam movie starring Adil Ibrahim, Malavika Menon and Devan in prominent roles. The cast also includes Salim Kumar, Dharmajan Bolgatty and Tini Tom. It is a drama directed by Baburaj Harisri and Harisree Yousuf with Nadirsha as the music composer, forming part of the crew.
title: Hello Dubaikkaran
